author: Christian Bromann <christian@saucelabs.com>
name: cucumber-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate project to run WebdriverIO tests with Cucumber

scripts.clean: read -p "Are you sure you want to clean the project? [y/n] " REPLY; if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then rm -R .git .github demo-app test .codeclimate.yml .travis.yml jest.json wdio.BUILD.conf.js src/features/**; fi
